talk_1010: <sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Wakeup>I've got to get some sleep. See you later!
talk_1012:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:SurpriseS_00>What is that thick, muddy gunk anyway?!<sp:5:0:0>
Ugh, and those stones are blocking the
road. This isn't good...
talk_1013:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS_01>Ha, what do you know. Never thought I'd
run into a fellow traveler here.<sp:5:1:0> You look as
determined to get through as I am!
<sp:3:0:2:0501>Well, <sp:5:0:0>I don't know exactly what happened
here, but...

There's some mysterious gunk and giant
stones blocking the path. All the way
to the domain, it looks like.
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_00>But if I can somehow manage to beast my
way through...I'll probably get really buff!

<snd:LaughS_00><sp:0:2:2:5000>I'll be buff AND keep my promise to meet up with
Finley... That's like bursting two bubbles with
one poke!<sp:0:2:2:6400>
talk_1014:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Greeting_01>Look over there.<sp:5:0:0> After I cross that big
bridge, I'll finally be at Zora's Domain.

<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Ease_00>Looking back...<sp:5:1:0> I'm amazed I was able to
make it through that dangerous path.

I'm a merchant by trade, but I would
never take on such a perilous journey
just for work.
After all, whether you move forward or
turn back, there are always customers
to be found.
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Angry_01>What's really important is who is waiting
for me after I overcome this challenge!
I did all of this for her.
I'm sure you know the feeling.<sp:5:0:0> You must
have journeyed through the gunk to see
someone important as well, right?
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:TalkPositive_00>Heh, you don't have to answer that. Just
tell your important person I said hi!
talk_1008:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive_00>I'm gonna go to talk to Finley <sp:5:0:0>at our
usual spot.
talk_1015:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Think_00>Many travelers turned back. <sp:5:0:0>Of course
they would in a situation like this.

If you're not a bird or a fish, you have to
follow this path to get to <clr:0000>Zora's Domain<clr:ffff>.
Sometimes all you can do is give up.
<sp:3:0:2:0501>But...


<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Angry_01>I HAVE to get there!


Finley is waiting for me at Zora's Domain!
talk_1009:
<sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:Think>Looks like I got here first. <sp:5:1:0>I wonder if
Finley is on her way...
talk_1016:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Angry_01>Finley is waiting for me...<sp:5:1:0> I'll find a way to
Zora's Domain no matter what...

No matter how long it takes!
near04: I wonder if I'm too early.
talk_1017:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Greeting_00>I guess this is just about the midway point
to Zora's Domain...

When my muscles stop aching, I'll keep
going. Can't overdo it or they won't grow,
after all.
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:TalkPositive_00>You be careful out there!
talk_1018:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Tired_01>Just a little bit farther until I reach
Zora's Domain!

<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0101>I wonder how Finley will react when she sees me!<sp:0:2:2:6400>
